title: WHOAMI
content:
Hello, my name is Ghali (aka ggg or triple g), and welcome to my site. This site is more of a personal site, where I share projects that I made and also for my blogs.
## **So whoami**
By the time I'm writing this, I'm 18 years old. I love coding and IT (Information technology), but I generally love learning. I have found knowledge interesting since I was a kid, and my passion for technology has only grown stronger over the years, too.

As a child, I used to find the world fascinating, and I still do. I developed a passion for science, and I found it puzzling. The feeling when you understood something was amazing. Technology only rewarded that puzzle.

By the age of 13 - back in the summer of 2018, I discovered coding. And I started coding Discord bots using [discord.js](https://discord.js.org/), a [node.js](https://nodejs.org/en) library. So, my first programming language was [Javascript](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/JavaScript). In 2020, I made my first serious project with two friends, Y0ung and Smart. [Hit Radio discord bot](https://discord.gg/8RfM6W2E), a bot that plays a Moroccan Radio station, ultimately, throughout the years and even with less consistent work on the bot tho, the bot gained a small popularity, reaching close to 500 servers and 85k users, which really is one of my favorite achievements, I got into hacking later that year and started playing [CTFs (capture the flag)](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Capture_the_flag_(cybersecurity)), which they are these hacking games, where u try to break a challenge and getting code which called the flag. After two years I got into drugs and - let's just say I experimented with some - so and I know this is a dumb thing to say but I'll say it anyway. I love drugs, I think if used moderately, they can be beneficial to people. So yeah, I smoke weed, love that drug tried LSD once and I loved it too - I will talk about them both later on another blog, as I think they are both beneficial too -

So this will be a short autobiography about me - I'm not a writer by the way -

I love music too, to be honest, I listen to everything but my favorite genres are EDM, techno and house, I'm really a fan of Ye and I found his music amazing, love Fred again too and many artists too, this is my [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/user/31z5m5mz557r5mpipqsohrwyjkmq?si=nKbaWKsBTfy4qD3jOVNP3g) if you wanna listen to my playlists, I also love movies, I'm talking good movies, I love a lot and if I have to choose my top 10, it would be :

• Everything everywhere all at once
• Interstellar
• Inception 
• Paprika 
• Project X
• Enter the void 
• Daisies
• The hangover
• The pursuit of happyness
• Midsommar 

I watched a lot but those what I can remember, this is [my letterboxd](https://boxd.it/6GdbF) and this is [the list of movies I watched](https://boxd.it/npgXc). I love shows too my favorites are:

• Mr Robot
• Breaking Bad
• How to sell drugs online(fast)
• Neon Genesis Evangelion
• Black Mirror

I watched a lot too, and I can't mention them all.

I think I mentioned everything about me, I might do other blogs on other topics later. I hope you enjoyed the read and I hope you have a good day or night, love you all xoxo!
description: A very short autobiography about me
